name: John Dela Cruz
subject: Request for commission details
message: Can I commission an abstract painting by Artist Luna?
response: Hello John! Yes, Artist Luna accepts commission requests. Please fill out the commission form on our website or reply with your preferred size and theme so we can proceed.
